name: Royalty Review Council
tag_list: entertainment, royalty-accounting, royalty-audits, music, film, tv, games
overview:
Founded in 1999 by the foremost expert in music royalty accounting, Royalty Review Council specializes in financial consulting services for media and entertainment companies.

Their services include Digital Audits, Outsource Royalty Accounting, Song Catalog Due Diligence and Specialized Financial Consulting Services. They have worked with all the major record companies, as well as many independent copyright owners and content publishers. Royalty Review Council is recognized as one of the first independent companies to build new infrastructures for managing, processing and reporting royalties from traditional and new digital business, including all download, subscription, webcast, stream and pay-per-play business around the world through channels of distribution or purchase such as kiosks, computers, TV set top boxes and wireless devices.
